mapper.sql: ID_PROFILE_TABLE AS profileTableId , ID_DATABASE AS databaseId , ID_PROFIEL_TABLE_GROUP AS profielTableGroupId , PROFIEL_NAME AS profielName , PROFIEL_DESC AS profielDesc , SCHEMA_NAME AS schemaName , TABLE_NAME AS tableName , CONDITION AS condition , CREATE_TIME AS createTime , USER_ID AS userId , TABLE_NAME_TAG AS tableNameTag , CREATE_USER AS createUser , UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
